<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lie Detector](/Feats.aspx?ID=1458) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 62 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[empiricism methodology](/Methodologies.aspx?ID=2) or [interrogation methodology](/Methodologies.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You're adept at noticing the tells of a liar—sweat, flushing, a quavering voice, a quickening pulse. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85) and to Perception DCs against attempts to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) to you. When you determine someone is lying to you, you can use their deceit to your advantage to gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the next [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6), [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7), or [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check you attempt against that creature within the next minute.
name: Lie Detector
